page.title: 11THE JERSEY FARM
page.content: can survive at great extremes of climate.Secondly,they produce very high quality milk with up to 7% or 8% fat content.This means they are ideal for dairy products like cream. On the farm the cattle are housed in loose housing over the winter and fed silage and barley. Milking will soon be by a pipeline system to the tank. It is done twice a day,around 7.00am and 4.00pm.At present it takes 1\ hrs to milk all the cows.This should decrease to about an hour when the pipeline is finished. Mr.Lindsay has no plans for future increases in his herd,and would like to think that it would remain much the same in the years to come.
